an4.189:2: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā satiyā sacchikaraṇīyā? Pubbenivāso, bhikkhave, satiyā sacchikaraṇīyo.
an4.189:3: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā cakkhunā sacchikaraṇīyā? Sattānaṁ cutūpapāto, bhikkhave, cakkhunā sacchikaraṇīyo.
an4.189:4: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā paññāya sacchikaraṇīyā? Āsavānaṁ khayo, bhikkhave, paññāya sacchikaraṇīyo.
